/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. A white fence runs along the side of the road, providing a stark contrast to the greenery. Cars are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the hustle and bustle of city life. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, adding depth to the image. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and bushes standing out against the blue of the sky. Overall, the image provides a glimpse into the daily life in Beijing, blending urban development with natural beauty.
